analysis.description:
Reentrancy in GlobexSciICO.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/24/0x845565dfeec2d3eeb1583cf3a6336428be59c19b.sol#193-218):
	External calls:
	- token.transfer(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/24/0x845565dfeec2d3eeb1583cf3a6336428be59c19b.sol#207-208)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- weiRaised (/unique_chucks/24/0x845565dfeec2d3eeb1583cf3a6336428be59c19b.sol#212-213)

Reentrancy in GlobexSciICO.finalize (/unique_chucks/24/0x845565dfeec2d3eeb1583cf3a6336428be59c19b.sol#228-232):
	External calls:
	- unsoldTokens = token.balanceOf(this) (/unique_chucks/24/0x845565dfeec2d3eeb1583cf3a6336428be59c19b.sol#229-230)
	- token.transfer(wallet,unsoldTokens) (/unique_chucks/24/0x845565dfeec2d3eeb1583cf3a6336428be59c19b.sol#230)
	State variables written after the call(s):

GlobexSciICO.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/24/0x845565dfeec2d3eeb1583cf3a6336428be59c19b.sol#193-218) does not use the value returned by external calls:
